# https://github.com/bkeepers/dotenv/issues/530
# Command substitution double-quote expansion
RETAIN_INNER_QUOTES={"foo": "bar"}
RETAIN_INNER_QUOTES_EXPAND="$(echo "$RETAIN_INNER_QUOTES")"
